title: Thai Semantic End-of-Turn Detection for Real-Time Voice Agents
summary: Fluid voice-to-voice interaction requires reliable and low-latency detection of when a user has finished speaking. Traditional audio-silence end-pointers add hundreds of milliseconds of delay and fail under hesitations or language-specific phenomena.
